name: Evade The Reaction
description:
Submission for Weekly Game Jam 170. This week's theme is "Chain Reaction".

Enemies don't kill you when they touch you, in fact it's the opposite. However they do tend to shoot two bullets when they die. Careful how you run and where you shoot or you'll trigger a chain reaction. Oh, and your gun is malfunctioning. Good luck!

There are 2 portals you can use to escape death. One is very far away and gives a massive final score reward, the other is for cowards. Inversely if you don't want to escape you can trigger a massive chain reaction of bullets, and if you survive 600 enemies dying without you getting hit, you win.

WASD to move

Space to trigger a Bomb that removes all bullets for 3 seconds

Escape or P to pause
